senses.de: Something that is done or arranged in advance, prior to a specific time or event.
senses.ex: We need to prepare for the meeting beforehand to be successful.

Tips.title: Time Management
Tips.description: Using 'beforehand' shows the importance of doing something early for better preparation.
Tips.example: Study the topics beforehand to ace the test.

Tips.title: Sequence Clarity
Tips.description: 'Beforehand' clarifies that an action was completed before another, emphasizing order.
Tips.example: Charge the camera beforehand so we can take pictures all day.

Tips.title: Imply Readiness
Tips.description: Using 'beforehand' can imply professionalism or thoroughness in preparing for events.
Tips.example: The team prepared their presentation beforehand, impressing the clients.

Former.wordDefinition:
Former means something that existed or happened in the past, it describes someone or something that previously held a particular position or was in a certain situation.

For example, "My former boss was really strict."

Beforehand refers to doing something before an event while former refers to something or someone in the past.

Introductory.wordDefinition:
Introductory means something that introduces or begins something else, often the starting point or initial stage. For example, "The first chapter of the book is the introductory section that gives context to the rest of the story.".

Beforehand describes actions or preparedness that occur ahead of time, while introductory describes things that come at the beginning and introduce something else.

Previous.wordDefinition:
Previous means existing or taking place before the present or a particular time.

It is used when we want to refer to something that has already happened or existed in the past. For example, "I've met her on a previous occasion.".

Beforehand is used to refer to something that needs to be done or prepared in advance, whereas previous is used to refer to something that has occurred or existed in the past.

quotes.Text: I wasn't ready for fame and all that brings to your life. It was an amazing experience, but so overwhelming, because no one can tell you beforehand when it will happen or how it will impact you. So no one can tell you how to handle it, being stopped everywhere you go because people saw you on 'Oprah.' It took me over, and I wasn't ready.
quotes.Title: American Author
quotes.Name: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.Text: I love shooting, when the character is interesting and the script is interesting, but the research beforehand is really fun. The whole process makes me anxious and restless, and I have trouble sleeping, just trying to figure out the character.
quotes.Title: American Actor
quotes.Name: Matt Damon

quotes.Text: Is anything, in all respects, so influential as consideration? Does it not, by a kindly anticipation, create the divisions of the active life itself, in a manner rehearsing and arranging beforehand what has to be done?
quotes.Title: Saint
quotes.Name: Saint Bernard

quotes.Text: Even if you're improvising, the fact that beforehand you know certain things will work helps you make those improvisations successful. It really helps to have a certain amount of knowledge about musical structure.
quotes.Title: Welsh Musician
quotes.Name: John Cale

quotes.Text: Life, liberty, and property do not exist because men have made laws. On the contrary, it was the fact that life, liberty, and property existed beforehand that caused men to make laws in the first place.
quotes.Title: French Economist
quotes.Name: Frederic Bastiat

quotes.Text: I think we can say our business plan worked even if a lot of people questioned if it could work beforehand and said we would be just like one of the other ones who came in in the last years.
quotes.Title: Italian Celebrity
quotes.Name: Guenther Steiner

quotes.Text: The truth was, I never liked the rose ceremonies. The cocktail parties beforehand are also difficult as there is so much stress and nervousness that's put on everyone.

quotes.Name: Andi Dorfman

quotes.Text: When you're faced with something for the first time, and if you're scared to death of that, you might want to reconcile your life beforehand.
quotes.Title: American Astronaut
quotes.Name: Sunita Williams

quotes.Text: When you make a movie independently, you raise the money beforehand, and then you make the movie kind of by yourself.
quotes.Title: American Actor
quotes.Name: Taylor Lautner

quotes.Text: There can be no wise politics without thought beforehand.
quotes.Title: English Philosopher
quotes.Name: Annie Besant
